description:
Karmik focuses on human resources and organizational behavior excellence through workshops,
                                case studies, and industry interactions. Members gain insights into talent management,
                                organizational development, and employee relations.

The club organizes regular events including HR case studies, guest lectures from industry
                                leaders, talent management workshops, and organizational behavior sessions. Members get
                                hands-on experience in recruitment processes, performance management, and understanding
                                workplace dynamics.

Through active participation in Karmik, students develop leadership skills, learn to manage
                                people effectively, and build a strong foundation in HR principles that prepare them for
                                successful careers in human resources and organizational development.
